recommended_degree: Manajemen, Psikologi, Hubungan Internasional, Ilmu Komunikasi, Pendidikan Bahasa Mandarin (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Supporting recruitment process: job posting, screening CV, scheduling interviews.
Assisting in employee data administration and document filing.
Supporting training arrangement and updating training records.
Helping with attendance or leave data recap.
Assisting employee engagement activities.
